definitions.meaning: 难以置信的；令人震惊的
definitions.usage: 形容某事物或情况令人难以相信，通常带有惊讶、震撼或不可思议的情感，常用于正面或中性的语境。

examples.scene: 你和朋友在咖啡馆聊天，朋友分享了一个他在旅行中遇到的奇妙经历，关于一个陌生人如何在关键时刻帮助了他。
examples.chineseIdea: 你想表达这个经历听起来太不可思议了，充满了戏剧性和意外。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The way he described it, it was @ @ @ that left us all speechless.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The way he described it, it was 「an incredible story」 that left us all speechless.
examples.chineseTranslation: 他描述的方式，简直是一个「令人难以置信的故事」，让我们都惊呆了。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'This story is very unbelievable.' 纠正：'This is an incredible story.'（'unbelievable' 听起来过于绝对，而 'incredible' 更自然且符合语感。）

examples.scene: 你在音乐会上观看一位年轻钢琴家的表演，她的技巧和情感表达让你感到震撼。
examples.chineseIdea: 你想表达这位钢琴家的天赋超乎寻常，令人叹为观止。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: Her performance showcased @ @ that amazed the entire audience.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: Her performance showcased 「incredible talent」 that amazed the entire audience.
examples.chineseTranslation: 她的表演展现了「惊艳的天赋」，让整个观众都为之惊叹。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'She has very great talent.' 纠正：'She has incredible talent.'（'very great' 显得冗余，'incredible' 更能表达强烈的赞叹。）

definitions.usage: 形容某事物非常出色、优秀或令人愉悦，常用于表达高度赞美，带有积极的情感。

examples.scene: 你和家人去了一趟海边度假，站在悬崖上俯瞰大海，景色美得让你屏息。
examples.chineseIdea: 你想表达眼前的景色美得令人震撼，简直是完美的体验。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: From the cliff, we had @ @ @ that took our breath away.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: From the cliff, we had 「an incredible view」 that took our breath away.
examples.chineseTranslation: 从悬崖上，我们看到了「绝美的景色」，让我们屏住了呼吸。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'The view is very beautiful.' 纠正：'The view is incredible.'（'very beautiful' 太平淡，'incredible' 更能传达强烈的惊艳感。）

examples.scene: 你参加了一次海外志愿者活动，帮助当地社区建设学校，收获了深刻的人生感悟。
examples.chineseIdea: 你想表达这次经历不仅有趣，而且对你的人生有深远影响。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: Volunteering abroad was @ @ @ that changed my perspective on life.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: Volunteering abroad was 「an incredible experience」 that changed my perspective on life.
examples.chineseTranslation: 在国外做志愿者是一次「非常棒的经历」，改变了我对生活的看法。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'This experience is very meaningful.' 纠正：'This was an incredible experience.'（'very meaningful' 虽正确，但 'incredible' 更能突出独特性和强烈情感。）
